thread.title: Beachside photo has left people scratching their heads
thread.title_full: Beachside photo has left people scratching their heads

title: Beachside photo has left people scratching their heads
text: Share this article Share It then becomes clear that the photo is not a gorilla at all but rather a man bending over on the beach. The fisherman is leaning to collect his catch of the day and because of his position and the shadow cast by the sun his body forms the silhouette of the primate. On a close inspection viewers will notice that what appeared to be the silhouette of a gorilla is actually a fisherman bending over to collect his catch of the day If you were fooled by the illusion you are not alone with plenty of netizens admitting to being baffled by the image. User ButtonsAreForPushing said: 'I looked it, read the title, looked at it again...still briefly thought it was a gorilla.' User jeffoncom2 agreed adding: 'Until I read the text, I was legitimately wondering why and how a gorilla was wearing a hat on its ass. I'm done.' When these two cats decided to take a nap on the sofa, they didn't imagine that they would become a super two-headed and two-bodied creation This is just the latest in a long line of optical illusions to confuse the web with mind-boggling photos proving popular online. A recent collection of photographs, posted to Imgur , will leave you scratching your heads trying to discover what's wrong with them. From a two-headed dog to horses that appear to eat each other, these photographs have become accidental optical illusions that may take you a while to figure out. When one man decided to wear a T-shirt with an eyeball on the front, it was cleverly reflected in his friend's sunglasses The hilarious pictures have been viewed over 12,000 times on the image-sharing site and people can't seem to be able to work out what is going on. The cat with two heads and two bodies along with gorilla in a T-shirt and shorts might make you think twice about how you take a photograph next time. People might be slightly distracted when looking at this cute couples' photograph as they try to decide if that is his arm or hers This picture is made slightly creepy by the fact that it is hard to work out whose head belongs to whose body When the person in the desk in front decided to bend his head down, it made the man in front of him appear to have an unusually large body and small head These two dogs stood so close together that it looks as though their bodies are conjoined Can you work out who is carrying who in this photograph? A fun photo has turned into an accidental optical illusion Beware of the two-headed dog! An odd camera angle makes these pets appear to share one body Due to the way in which they have stood, this horse appears to be eating another horse The glass reflection makes the gorilla at the zoo look as though he is wearing the same outfit as the visitor on the other side When a basketball player decided to bow his head, he got caught with a brand new one by the photographer Read more:
